text: Thai Curry is a 2019 action comedy Indian Bengali film, directed by Ankit Aditya, and produced by Greentouch Entertainment and Aditya Productions. The film starring Soham Chakroborty, Hiran Chatterjee, Rudranil Ghosh, Saswata Chatterjee, Abhijit Guha, Bidya Sinha Saha Mim, Rachel White, Trina Saha, Poulomi Das, Ayoshi Talukdar and Sayan Ghosh, is bankrolled by Shyam Sundar Dey and Anirban Aditya. The film was theatrically released on 1 March 2019. == Synopsis == Three friends decide to go to Thailand for a fun trip, but they get entangled with the mafia group. == Cast == * Hiran Chatterjee * Soham Chakraborty * Trina Saha * Bidya Sinha Saha Mim * Rudranil Ghosh * Rachel White * Saswata Chatterjee * Pallavi Chatterjee ==Release== The film was theatrically released on 1 March 2019. == References == == External links == * Category:2019 films Category:Indian films Category:2019 action comedy films Category:Bengali-language films Category:Indian action comedy films Category:2010s Bengali-language films Category:Foreign films shot in Thailand Category:2019 comedy films
title: Thai Curry (film)
